attributes.action: Remove V.A.T. and/or duty on LPG fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of LPG fuel is on the increase, especially on disabled vehicles & public utility vehicles, e.g. police cars, council lorries etc., & the effluent mainly water vapour, and therefore ecologically desirable.
I move that all taxes be removed to encourage it`s use.
